title: Honor Capsule just ruined my ARAM account by unlocking Warwick
body:
So I got an honor capsule randomly and just clicked it because why not right?

Well it randomly and without warning unlocked Warwick permanently, along with a random Warwick skin. 

Nothing against Warwick, but this account is literally an ARAM only account, I play nothing else, and I intentionally only unlocked the champions I actually enjoy playing and nothing else... I only unlock ADCs and a small handful of other champs I enjoy in this game. This just totally ruins that by adding a permanent Warwick into the mix, it's not even a debatable champ for me, I have him unlocked on another account and hes fun jungling, but I don't like him in ARAM at all. 

I instantly went to the store purchase history page and checked but it isn't even refundable there. 

This is lame, can I get Warwick locked again somehow? I never thought I'd have to worry about random unavoidable champ unlocks... this is cool for people that want warwick but there needs to be some sort of confirmation prompt for cases like mine...

replies.body: Awwwwww man.....you might be a little conflicted about wanting this removed here in a second. That Grey Warwick skin you got is not actually obtainable anymore *except* through those capsules, and at a pretty low drop rate as well. We won't be able to move it to a different account or return it, but if you'd like this champion removed we can do so in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

We won't be able to move it to a different account or return it, but if you'd like this champion removed we can do so in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

You mean they will remove it for me? Awesome.

Yeah I'd love to have that skin on my main account so that's unlucky... but most importantly is being able to play the champs I enjoy I think.

Thanks for this reply, puts me at ease haha.
